response.overview: Students enjoy reading along with four classic tales written at a second-grade level. Fun, simple animation provides entertainment, but does not distract young learners from following along with the words on screen. After each story, students are rewarded by reading and singing a cool, rocking song that reviews the story and presents more challenging words.
response.title: Rock 'N Learn: Read Along Stories
